the last couple of lines repeat for a few hundred meg worth of log, so I'll
spare you.

Just for the record, ApacheBench, Version 1.3d works just fine!.  I have never
seen this kind of problem before.

You filed this against 2.1-HEAD but I presume you've only actually reproduced
the problems against 2.0.48?  There are ab fixes on HEAD which seem to make
these timeout problems go away in my testing, they should probably be backported
to 2.0.
creator: jorton@redhat.com

text: Looking for user feedback on what version they used...
creator: chip@force-elite.com
